trans-unit.source: Filemounts describe a filepath on the server, relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: Filmonteringspunkt beskriver filstien på serveren, relativt eller absolut.

trans-unit.source: By creating a file mount record and placing a reference to it in a Backend usergroup you can allow a user access to the file mount in the File>List module. Filemounts may also configure access to a path on the server to which the user has FTP-access. Just remember to set file-permissions on the server correctly so the webserver user (which PHP is running as) has at least read access to the FTP-dir. You can only mount absolute paths if they are within the base path set in $TYPO3_CONF_VARS[BE][lockRootPath]
trans-unit.target: Ved at oprette et filmonteringselement og placere en reference til det i Backend brugergruppen kan du give brugeren adgang til filmonteringspunktet i Filer>Filliste modulet. Filmonteringspunkt kan også definere adgang til en sti på serveren som brugeren har FTP-adgang til. Husk blot at sætte filrettighederne på serveren korrekt så webserver brugeren (som PHP kører som) så den i det mindste har adgang til FTP-biblioteket. Du kan kun montere absolutte stier, hvis de er i grundstien i $TYPO3_CONF_VARS[BE][lockRootPath]

trans-unit.source: be_groups:file_mountpoints, be_users:file_mountpoints, More about File mounts | https://docs.typo3.org/typo3cms/InsideTypo3Reference/CoreArchitecture/AccessControl/MoreAboutFileMounts/
trans-unit.note: A part of this string is an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy this part into the translation field and do not change it. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.
trans-unit.target: be_groups:file_mountpoints, be_users:file_mountpoints, Mere om fil mounts | https://docs.typo3.org/typo3cms/InsideTypo3Reference/CoreArchitecture/AccessControl/MoreAboutFileMounts/

trans-unit.source: Enter a title for the filemount. The title will appear as the name of the file mount when it is applied to users and groups.
trans-unit.target: Indtast en titel på filmonteringspunktet. Titlen vises som navnet på filmonteringspunktet, når det tildeles brugere og brugergrupper.

trans-unit.source: Enter the path of the filemount, relative or absolute depending on the settings of BASE.
trans-unit.target: Indtast stien på filmonteringspunktet, relativt eller absolut, afhængigt af indstillingerne for BASE.

trans-unit.source: If BASE is set to relative, the path mounted is found in the subfolder "fileadmin/" of the website. Then you should enter the subfolder in "fileadmin/" as path. For instance if you want to mount access to "fileadmin/user_uploads/all/" then enter the value "user_uploads/all" as the value of PATH. If BASE is absolute you should enter the absolute path on the server, eg. "/home/ftp_upload" or "C:/home/ftp_upload". Further you must make sure the configuration variable $TYPO3_CONF_VARS[BE][lockRootPath] contains the first part of the path you want to mount. Notice: In any case, make sure the webserver user which PHP is running as has at least read-access to the path. If not, the mount will simply not appear without any warnings. If you have problems - especially with absolute mounts - try to mount something "simple" like a relative path in fileadmin. If that is working well, try the absolute path. Your PHP-configuration may also impose other restrictions on you if open_basedir is enabled. Then use relative paths.
trans-unit.target: Såfremt BASE er sat til relativ er den monterede sti relativ i forhold til underbiblioteket "fileadmin/" til websitet. Du skal skrive et underbibliotek til "fileadmin/" som sti. F.eks. hvis du vil montere adgang til "fileadmin/user_uploads/all" skal du skrive "uploads/all/". Hvis BASE er absolut, skal du skrive den absolute sti, f.eks. "/home/ftp_upload" eller "C:/home/ftp_upload". Endvidere skal du sikre dig at $TYPO3_CONF_VARS[BE][lockRootPath] indeholder den første del af den sti, du vil montere. Bemærk: Webserver-brugeren, PHP kører som, skal som minimum have læseadgang til stien. Ellers vil monteringspunktet ikke blive vist. Hvis du har problemer med absolutte stier - prøv at montere noget simpelt som en relativ sti til "fileadmin/". Hvis det fungerer så prøv den absolutte sti. Din PHP konfiguration kan også indeholde andre restriktioner, såsom safe_mode eller open_basedir. I de tilfælde benyt da relative stier.

trans-unit.source: This is a filemount relative to "fileadmin/". The mounted folder is "fileadmin/user_upload/" since "user_upload" is the value of the "Path" field. The directory structure of "fileadmin/" where you can see the "user_upload" folder in the bottom of the list.
trans-unit.target: Det er et filmonteringspunkt relativt til "fileadmin/". Den monterede folder er "fileadmin/user_upload/" da "user_upload" er værdien i Path feltet. Biblioteksstrukturen af "fileadmin/" hvor du kan se "user_upload" biblioteket i bunden af listen.

trans-unit.source: Use this option to temporarily disable the filemount.
trans-unit.target: Brug denne mulighed for midlertidig at sætte filmonteringspunktet ud af funktion.

trans-unit.source: All backend users using the mount will not have access anymore. This includes 'Admin'-users.
trans-unit.target: Alle Backend brugere, der benytter dette monteringspunkt vil ikke længere have adgang. Dette inkluderer admin-brugere.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the PATH field is to be recognized as an absolute path on the server or a path relative to the fileadmin/ subfolder to the website.
trans-unit.target: Afgør om værdien PATH genkendes som en absolut sti på serveren eller som en relativ sti til "fileadmin/" underbiblioteket på websitet.

trans-unit.source: Display this file mount as read-only.
Read-only file mounts are displayed in the Filelist and the Element Browser. They allow displaying of files and folders which are neither writable nor editable for the user.
trans-unit.target: Read-inly filmontager vises i Fillisten og Elementbrowseren. De tillader visning af filer og mapper, som hverken er skrivbare eller redigérbare for brugeren.
